name: The Encouragement Kids
description:
My Entry for the 2018 CDN Christian Speedgame!

In The Encouragement Kids, you play as 1 out of 10 selectable characters, that must find and encourage the depressed citizens of Encouragement City!

Beware, as the Depression Spirits lurking around the city will try to stop you!

Follow the Pointer arrow, floating over your head to find the next citizen!

Some citizens are trapped in force fields! Find a nearby switch to free them!

Compatible with Xbox 360 Controller! 

Bug Alerts!!!

-If using the keyboard, use the 'E' key to advance the dialog. Pressing the Spacebar will result in the dialog getting 'stuck' on a black screen

-the controls screen says that 'ESC key' is to pause, its actually the 'Enter key'. Once you are in the pause menu make your selection by pressing the Spacebar

-to press start on the title screen with a keyboard, press the Spacebar
